summary: Defines a configuration class that translates OpenAI‑style embedding parameters into the format required by Vertex AI's text embedding service, handling options such as automatic truncation, task selection, and optional document titles, and provides utilities to convert Vertex AI responses back to OpenAI‑compatible structures.
business_intent: Facilitate the integration of Vertex AI's embedding capabilities into applications that expect OpenAI‑like APIs, allowing developers to leverage Vertex AI embeddings without changing their existing code or parameter conventions.
